text:
@realDonaldTrump " A couple from the Chicago area who were married nearly six decades died a few hours apart. A Florida couple ... six minutes apart. Another Wisconsin couple died on the same day last week in side-by-side hospital beds; they had been married 73 years."

entity.name: In Chicago, Trump calls the city an embarrassment to the US
entity.description: Donald Trump has opened his first visit to Chicago as president by disparaging the city as "embarrassing to us as a nation"
